SEARCH
Package model

Class Schedule

Object
Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
Represents the weekly schedule for a doctor, containing time slots for each day and their availability status.
Since:
2024-10-29
Version:
5.3
Author:
Chin Linn Sheng

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Doctor
    doctor
     
    static final int
    END_TIME
    The ending hour of the schedule (5 PM).
    static final int
    START_TIME
    The starting hour of the schedule (9 AM).
    static final int
    TOTAL_DAYS
    The total number of working days in the schedule.
    static final int
    TOTAL_SLOTS
    The total number of time slots in a day (calculated as END_TIME - START_TIME).
    private final HashMap<String,HashMap<Integer,Availability>>
    weeklySlots
     

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Schedule(Doctor doctor)
    Constructs a Schedule object for the specified doctor, initializing the weekly time slots and setting all to AVAILABLE by default.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Doctor
    getDoctor()
    Gets the doctor associated with this schedule.
    HashMap<String,HashMap<Integer,Availability>>
    getWeeklySlots()
    Gets the weekly schedule slots, mapping each date to its hourly availability.
    void
    initializeWeeklySchedule()
    Initializes the weekly schedule by setting up daily time slots for each of the specified working days, marking each slot as AVAILABLE.
    void
    setAvailabilityForParticularDate_Time(String date, int time, Availability availability)
    Sets the availability status for a specific time slot on a particular date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Schedule

      public Schedule(Doctor doctor)
      Constructs a Schedule object for the specified doctor, initializing the weekly time slots and setting all to AVAILABLE by default.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor to whom this schedule belongs

  • Method Details

    • initializeWeeklySchedule

      public void initializeWeeklySchedule()
      Initializes the weekly schedule by setting up daily time slots for each of the specified working days, marking each slot as AVAILABLE.

    • getDoctor

      public Doctor getDoctor()
      Gets the doctor associated with this schedule.
      Returns:
      the doctor associated with this schedule

    • getWeeklySlots

      public HashMap<String,HashMap<Integer,Availability>> getWeeklySlots()
      Gets the weekly schedule slots, mapping each date to its hourly availability.
      Returns:
      the weekly slots with availability statuses for each hour and date

    • setAvailabilityForParticularDate_Time

      public void setAvailabilityForParticularDate_Time(String date, int time, Availability availability)
      Sets the availability status for a specific time slot on a particular date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which the availability status is being set
      time - the hour for which the availability is being set
      availability - the new availability status
